price: Those when afflicted with a disaster, say, “We belong to Allah, and to Him we will return.”
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتۡهُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
